thread.section_title: EasyPark Norge omtaler | Kundenes anmeldelser av EasyPark Norge | easypark.no
thread.title: Kamila

author: Kamila
title: Kamila
text:
I like the design and usability of the app. I also love the idea, it makes parking much much easier.
The only thing I don't like, is when you want to extend active parking time. Assume talking with someone, I increase the time, and I'm answering the question, then I don't remember If I confirmed new time, or not? The counter will show new time anyway, even if it is not confirmed..
great app even though!
maybe it should change colour to indicate it was modified but not confirmed?
